Chinese.Description: 你的四肢变成八条蛛腿，你可以像蜘蛛一样移动，但你现在只能用嘴叼着一件东西。同时，你的食量增大，并倾向于食肉。蜘蛛将不再敌视你，但是，闪光果和烟雾果对你是致命的。<LINE>你的投掷技巧降低，可以迅速撕咬其他生物（伤害参考狼蛛），你的大跳能短暂撞晕其他生物。再次叠加，则你可以长按设定键，使用方向键进行瞄准，在蓄力完成后松开按键，即可发射麻醉毒镖。

English.Description: Turns slugcat into a spider hybrid, slugcat will have the mobility of a spider but must eat more food. Slugcat will be able to eat meat and other spiders will no longer be aggressive towards it.Beware that Flare Bomb and Spore Cloud are deadly to you.<LINE>Your throwing skills have decreased, and you can quickly bite other creatures (damage reference wolf spiders). Your big jump can briefly knock out other creatures. If stacked again, you can long press the setting button, use the directional keys to aim, and release the button after accumulating power to launch the anesthetic dart.
